Author: livipup
Text: True. But then you still look bloated after meals because being a few pounds less makes you thinner so it's *even more* noticeable. :( I just want to be empty all the time, but you can't live like that. I've thought about switching to a liquid diet, but that's bad for your oral health. Straight teeth are important and chewing food helps keep your teeth straight.

Author: curseme09
Text: I feel this hard.  I dread the feeling of being bloated also...literally every meal I look pregnant and then my night is ruined.
